mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `User` (name, id, password, passwordHint, passwordAnswer, phoneNumber,email, generation, teacher, gender, isEmployed, campus, birth) VALUES (#{name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{passwordHint}, #{passwordAnswer}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{generation}, #{teacher}, #{gender}, #{isEmployed}, #{campus}, #{birth})
